text: Ljubojević (, ) is a Serbo-Croatian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Darko Ljubojević (born 1975), retired Bosnian Serb footballer *Divna Ljubojević (born 1970), Serbian singer *Goran Ljubojević (born 1983), retired Croatian footballer *Ljubomir Ljubojević (born 1950), Serbian Grandmaster of chess *Petar Ljubojević, Austrian captain of the Varaždin Generalate Category:Croatian-language surnames Category:Serbian-language surnames Category:Slavic-language surnames Category:Patronymic surnames
title: Ljubojević
